author: jukka
msg: TIKA-334: HtmlParser should use CharsetDetector whenever no charset is specified via meta http-equiv tag

Note that the BufferedInputStream wrapper needs to be applied *outside* the getEncoding() method so that the mark()/reset() operations affect the stream instance that's later passed to tagsoup for parsing.

author: jukka
msg: TIKA-332: Use http-equiv meta tag charset info when processing HTML documents
